full_instructions: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Symbol Search[/b] activity.
You will see 3 sets of symbols on top and 2 on the bottom.
You will be asked to tap the set on the bottom that is exactly the same as a set above.
Please be as fast and accurate as you can.
full_instructions_MatchPairsTop2: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Symbol Search[/b] activity.
You will see 2 sets of symbols on top and 2 on the bottom.
You will be asked to tap the set on the bottom that is exactly the same as a set above.
Please be as fast and accurate as you can.
full_instructions_MatchPairsTop4: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Symbol Search[/b] activity.
You will see 4 sets of symbols on top and 2 on the bottom.
You will be asked to tap the set on the bottom that is exactly the same as a set above.
Please be as fast and accurate as you can.
